title: Résumé Building Workshop
headline: Study how to build an effective professional résumé and succeed in your first job interview in this free online course.
description: Writing a résumé can be frustrating, especially if you do not know where to start. We have designed this free online course to teach you how to develop a professional résumé that will help you sell yourself so that you can obtain your dream job. We provide different templates to help you build your résumé . Then you will learn how to set your own goals and discover professional tips to ensure a successful job interview. Sign up now!
courseDescription:
A résumé is a printed or digital document outlining the accomplishments that are supposed to sell or prove your worth to employers. This course first explains what a professional résumé is and introduces the course instructor and some of her professional work experiences. Then, you will learn how to sell your concepts and ideas to fit into the position that you are seeking. In this section, we will provide you with options for dealing with your strengths and weaknesses that prevent you from doing what interests you. After that, you will explore the ‘four Fs’ of building a professional résumé. 

Next, you will go through examples of some basic résumés. You will first be shown an ’unappealing’ handwritten one and asked to detect its errors. We supply some tips on how to correct these blunders. Then we will provide you with a ‘reasonable’ printed resume and guide you on how to make it look more professional. Explore some explanatory templates and be advised on how to change them to either education-based or work-based and learn how to add other experiences and certifications if you have them. This section will also cover what you should or should not do when building a professional résumé. Research the differences between acting, arts and performance résumés. We will also explain the new industry standards for an acting résumé.

The following section teaches you how to set goals for yourself. First, you will learn about S.M.A.R.T. goals and, as you progress and understand what you love, we will explore D.U.M.B. goals. D.U.M.B. goals are essential to ensure you do what you love or those S.M.A.R.T. goals will be meaningless. We will explain each of the goals in detail. Additionally, you will be given professional tips for having a successful interview, including what to wear. Lastly, we provide you with a list of things not to do or wear when attending an interview. This résumé-building course is perfect for you if you are preparing for an interview or looking to develop a professional résumé. Enrol now!
